Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â» David Lynch ('Eraserhead', 'Twin Peaks') peels back the outer layers of smalltown America to reveal a perverse and surreal underbelly. Kyle MacLachlan stars as naive young Jeffrey Beaumont, who becomes involved in murder, voyeurism, sado-masochism and a terrifying evil after he discovers a severed ear in a deserted field. Isabella Rossellini plays a nightclub singer who Beaumont follows after his dicovery of the ear, who is ensnared in a brutal relationship with the psychopathic Frank (Dennis Hopper).
